snippet: Congressional Republicans are trying to tamper with institutions that won't do their bidding, an economist writes.
abstract: Congressional Republicans are trying to tamper with institutions that won't do their bidding, an economist writes.
lead_paragraph: Bruce Bartlett held senior policy roles in the Reagan and George H.W. Bush administrations and served on the staffs of Representatives Jack Kemp and Ron Paul. He is the author of "The Benefit and the Burden: Tax Reform - Why We Need It and What It Will Take."

headline.main: Tilting the Budget Process to the G.O.P.
